strings.name: YouthMappers UP
strings.description: YouthMappers chapter at University of Panama
strings.extendedDescription: Student mappers in Panama work with open spatial data to help identify, define, address, and create meaning about locally defined development challenges. They collaborate with students from other countries on community mapping topics from ecotourism to food security, from biodiversity to indigenous issues, promoting a humanistic vision through scientific perspectives.
